home.description: Bates Propulsion Labs is a small group of engineers working on a variety of different propulsion systems and launch vehicles. We are sharing our progress with the world to help inspire others to build their own rocketry projects.

poc1.summary: The POC-1 was built as a test engine to gain experience designing, building and operating a rocket propulsion system. This engine is not intended to fly as it uses a water cooling system. The cooling system is design as a regen system, but the flow rates required exceed that of the fuel system necessitating and external coolant supply.
